name: Shall we date?: Become Elite
storyline: Your rich uncle has suddenly passed away! You're going to inherit a share of his will, including the famous Water Lily estate. Together with three obnoxious butlers, you will spend the next three weeks training to come out into society at a formal debut.
summary:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.

Your rich uncle has suddenly passed away! You're going to inherit a share of his will, including the famous Water Lily estate. Together with three obnoxious butlers, you will spend the next three weeks training to come out into society at a formal debut.
